title: I am the Open Door
description: These spiritual discourses by various Ascended Masters, perfected beings who were once men and women on the earth like us, were dictated at the request of a being known as the Great Divine Director. Unlike most "channeled" books, these beings appeared visibly in their light bodies to give these teachings on how to contact one's own inner God presence, and call it into action through the word, "I AM." May all who feel the radiation of this book - which is that which only Ones Ascended can give - be inspired to apply this spiritual law, and to live according to this law of love. Dictated in 1977, this book of 14 short discourses has since become an international classic.
author: Ascended Masters
